mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notifications (user_id, pbct_no, notification_type, message, is_read) VALUES (#{userId}, #{pbctNo}, #{notificationType}, #{message}, #{isRead})
mapper.select: SELECT notification_id, user_id, pbct_no, notification_type, message, is_read, created_at FROM notifications WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE notifications SET is_read = TRUE WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_read = FALSE
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notifications WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_read = FALSE
